title: Blitzkrieg EVERYTHING All BK games 1&2 and more
description:
This Torrent contains all Blitzkrieg 1 & 2 games as well as games that use the blitzkrieg engine.

The games are.

Blitzkrieg 1
Blitzkrieg Rolling Thunder
Blitzkrieg Burning Horizon
Blitzkrieg Burning Hoizon 2  AKA Panzerkrieg
Mission Barbarossa
Mission Kursk
Talvisota Icy Hell
Stalingrad
Total Challenge 1-5
Cuban Missile Crisis Aftermath
Cuban Missile Crisis Ice Crusade
Blitzkrieg 2
Blitzkrieg 2 Liberation
Blitzkrieg 2 Fall of the Reich
Frontline Fields of Thunder

Also contains all patches and cracks for all games. A dual core patch for games that use the blitzkrieg 1 engine (use only on BK1 engine games)
Also contains custom unit skins and Extra missions and campaigns for blitzkrieg 2.
And a file that can be added to Mission Barbarossa and kursk to make the game easier for those that find it to hard. Makes them more like
Blitzkrieg 1 difficulty.
